review_data.title: Great mediterranean food
review_data.content: I was looking for an early dinner in Zurich and found this restaurant to be one of the few open at 4 PM serving food. I went there for pizza, and they do serve pizza, but what was unexpected was the vast array of Mediterranean/middle...More

review_data.title: Great little restaurant
review_data.content: The restaurant is situated just up the road from the Crowne Plaza Hotel and across from the Albisriederplatz tram stop. We gave it a try on our first night and all 6 of us had really good meals, so we ate here the next two...More

review_data.title: Excelente!
review_data.content: Excelente pizzaria!! Custo benefício excelente na Suiça! Para acompanhar peça uma cerveja, eles possuem vários rótulos disponíveis!!

review_data.title: Nice menu choices
review_data.content: Restaurant was right across the street from our Hotel Mercure Stoller. The menu included pizza, pasta and also a great schnitzel. Food and service was excellent; prices were good.
